description:
Welcome to the new mobile app from KFC Trinidad and Tobago. Our app now accepts online ordering for both delivery and pick up orders. Order and pay with a click of your finger. Have your order delivered to your location hot and fresh. Skip the line and go right up to the counter to collect your order with our Click & Collect service.

When you place your order, you get an email receipt with all of your order details. Show them to us when collecting your order. It’s that simple!

To get started, register and account and start browsing our famous menu. Get special exclusive promotions and deals when you sign up. Enjoying your KFC has never been so easy!

Welcome to the Church's Chicken Mobile Rewards App. Our app is a one of a kind fully integrated Rewards, Gift Card and Order Online App.

Order your favourite Chicken, Biscuits and Sides for Pick Up or Delivery. Our online ordering is quick and easy. You can pay online via credit card, reward points, gift card or pay on collection.

You can also earn Rewards for all your in store and online purchases using our app. Earn and redeem rewards for FREE products from any of our brands.

Our app also has an in app eWallet that allows you to go cashless and use your gift cards for in store or online purchases. You can also send a gift card to friends and family quickly and hassle free straight from your phone.

Welcome to Rewards by Global Brands. We invite you to download our app today!

Subway and “Eating Fresh” have been part of T&T for over 25 years. Now you can order for pick up or delivery with our new, convenient SubwayTT mobile app. There’s something for everyone, sandwiches, salads, wraps, pizzas, desserts and daily offers and specials. Make it what you want today.

Enter the new McDonald's App and get exclusive discounts and coupons!  

Download our app and easily access special experiences, promotions and discounts so you can enjoy your favorite McDonald's products for much less than what you usually pay.  

You will receive alerts at the moment to find out in scoop of our new coupons and offers available to you.

  In addition, to help you choose your favorite product, we show you all the products with their nutritional information of your favorite hamburger or sandwich, desserts, beverages, salads and cravings.

  Do you want a Big Mac, a McNuggets or a Chocolate Sundae and you do not know where to find your nearest McDonald's restaurant? Through the app you can go to the section "restaurants" and you can see the establishment at a less distance from you and check our schedules and services.

Our app is available in Argentina, Aruba, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Curacao, Ecuador, Guadeloupe, French Guiana, Martinique, Mexico, Panama, Peru, Puerto Rico, Trinidad and Tobago, Uruguay and Venezuela *.

Access your account and place an order for delivery through McDelivery, in Colombia and Brazil.  

What are you waiting for? Download it now and enjoy the advantages offered by the McDonald's app! Happiness in the form of an app has arrived!

The app uses geolocation to show promotions near the user's location.

* Venezuela does not include offers or discounts, only combos, restaurant locator and nutritional information.

Conveniently order Domino’s from anywhere on your iphone. Build your Domino's pizza just the way you like it or choose one of our pre built pizzas. Add items from the rest of our robust menu. And with the Domino’s Tracker ® you can follow your order from the moment you place it until it’s out for delivery, dine-in, carryout or pickup.

The Domino's Pizza App currently supports the following countries - Aruba, Bahamas, Cayman Islands, Dominican Republic, Puerto Rico, St. Kitts, St. Lucia and St. Maarten.

Download the Pizza Hut Trinidad and Tobago app for the easiest way to satisfy your pizza, wings, pasta and dessert cravings!! 

Our app is designed for pizza lovers, making fast food delivery and takeout even easier. Find a Pizza Hut closest to you, order for collection or delivery, and let’s make this happen.

Three good reasons to use our Pizza Hut app:
1.	When you want it – order for now or pre-order for later
2.	How you want it – order it your way or any way. Every customer is special, your meal shouldn’t be any different.
3.	You don’t have to ask for it – the more you order, the more we get to know you, the quicker and easier your next order will be.

Feed your family and friends with the Pizza Hut Trinidad and Tobago app!
The MyMario's App allows Mario's Pizzeria customers to order their favourite pizzas, sandwiches, burgers, fried chicken and much more from their mobile device.

Welcome to the Rituals Coffee House Mobile Rewards App. Our app is a one of a kind fully integrated Rewards. Gift Card and Order Online App.

Order Online for Pick up or Delivery and skip the line. Our online ordering is quick and easy. You can pay online via credit card, reward points, gift card or pay on collection.

You can also earn Rewards for all your in store and online purchases using our app. Earn and redeem rewards for FREE products from any of our brands.

Our app also has an in app eWallet that allows you to go cashless and use your gift cards for in store or online purchases. You can also send a gift card to friends and family quickly and hassle free straight from your phone.

Welcome to Rewards by Global Brands. We invite you to download our app today!

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

The concept of Neighbourhood Munchies App Ltd is built upon the idea of the neighbourhood. Everyone in the ideal neighbourhood comes together to support each other, to help each other, to grow together, and to EAT TOGETHER.

Our goal is simple – cater to our customers by providing top of the line customer service, speedy deliveries, and an app that’s user friendly for everyone. So, welcome to the neighbourhood, where we bring hungry neighbours the food they want!

Ordering food online made simple. Download the free HellofoodJA app and get delivery access to listed restaurants straight from your smartphone or tablet. At this time we offer delivery of the following International Franchises BURGER KING® LITTLE CAESAR'S® and POPEYE'S®

Enough wasting time driving in traffic to restaurants, waiting in checkout lines and drive through. You can order your favourite franchise from the HellofoodJA app.

 

Check out food images before adding them to your cart, customize your food the way you want it and find the latest promotions and deals all in one place.  Track your order online, Pay by card, or Cash on Delivery, get the door and enjoy your food!

HellofoodJA app at a glance:
• Select your area to find local restaurants of any of the International Franchises BURGER KING® LITTLE CAESAR'S® and POPEYE'S®
• Explore locally reviewed restaurants’ menus at your fingertips.
• Discover and receive updates on latest restaurant offers, promotions and discounts available near you.
• Easily control the restaurants you see using sort, filter, cuisines and search.
• Use smart search to find what you are looking for.
• View restaurant’s menu with updated images, prices and choices.
• Add your personal special request to any food item you choose.
• Choose when you want your order to be delivered.
• Pay securely with Debit card, Credit card or Cash on Delivery.
• You can save your delivery addresses for a faster ordering process.
• Share your food experience online by rating and reviewing your order.
• Login using your account details or take a moment and create an account. Members benefit from a better personalized ordering experience.
• Craving something you ordered before? Get access to your previous orders and reorder with ease.
• Need help? Please call 235- FOOD to get instant assistance using our Live Chat, our customer service agents are available 10am – 10pm 7 days a week.

We would love to hear from you, let us know your thoughts and suggestions. You can provide feedback at any time from ‘About App’ menu. For more information, you may contact us info@Hellofoodja.com or 235-FOOD


Hellofood….Good bye Hunger !!

Dashing to your service.

Your favourite takeaways, groceries and more delivered to your door in a dash.

ORDER FROM YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS

From Chinese to Venezuelan, from sushi to salads and pizza to gyros, there’s food for everyone on Bistro Dash.

ORDER YOUR GROCERIES FROM LOCAL STORES

If you’ve run out of milk or eggs, you can also order from one of our grocery partners and get your essentials delivered straight to your door.

With thousands of grocery products available, from daily essentials like milk, eggs and bread, to cooking ingredients and tasty snacks.

ORDER YOUR WAY

• Search for your favourite restaurants and stores

• Sort by fastest delivery time or top-rated services

• Get delivery or pickup 

• Schedule your food for later


TRACK YOUR FOOD

• Track progress in real-time

• Get alerts from your dasher

• Share your tracker with a group for larger orders

DELIVERY IN A DASH.
No matter whether you want your food now or later, whether you want a family sized feast or a small snack, download the Bistro Dash App and we’ll get your delivery to you in a dash.
欢迎来到米卡外卖！我们致力于为您提供一站式的生活服务平台，让您的生活更加轻松便捷。在这里，您不仅可以轻松订购地道泰国美食，实时跟踪订单，还能享受到快速的跑腿服务、专业的家政服务以及方便的租车服务。我们的应用支持多种支付方式，让您的使用过程更加轻松。立即下载米卡外卖，让我们为您带来优质的生活体验！

Every great meal starts with OpenTable. Download the app to find the perfect restaurant no matter where life takes you.  

DISCOVER SOMETHING NEW
- Choose from over 60,000+ restaurants worldwide 
- Search for happy hours, tasting menus, and other special dining experiences
- Get insights from real diners who have visited the restaurant with verified reviews
- Filter by cuisine, pricepoint, and more to fine-tune your options
- Take advantage of expert recommendations with OpenTable’s guides 

FIND A TIME THAT WORKS FOR YOU
- Search for specific dates, times, and specific locations to see what’s available when you want to go out 
- View full availability to see when you can get into your favorite spots 
- Use Notify Me to receive alerts for last-minute openings at popular restaurants

MANAGE YOUR PLANS IN ONE PLACE
- View and change reservations from the app
- Direct message with restaurants to ask questions, provide important information like dietary restrictions, and more 
- Earn bonus points for dining at specific restaurants when you create an OpenTable account

Follow us on:
https://www.instagram.com/opentable
https://www.tiktok.com/@opentable
https://www.youtube.com/c/OpenTable
https://www.facebook.com/OpenTable/

Need help? We love hearing from you! Reach out at https://help.opentable.com/

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

With the largest selection of restaurants, Wieat delivers your favorite foods to your door.
Order with a few simple taps in the Wieat app and get the eats delivered directly to you.
With real time tracking, follow your order until it’s at your door
Here’s a little taste of the foods, local flavours, and cuisines you should be excited about: burgers, donuts, pizza, sushi, Wings, Italian, Korean, Chinese, Vegan, Vegetarian and more!
Order delivery and get exclusive Wieat deals. Download today!

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

Welcome to the Pizza Boys Mobile Rewards App. Our app is a one of a kind fully integrated Rewards, Gift Card and Order Online App.

Order your favourite Pizzas, Burgers and calzones for Pick Up or Delivery. Our online ordering is quick and easy. You can pay online via credit card, reward points, gift card or pay on collection.

You can also earn Rewards for all your in store and online purchases using our app. Earn and redeem rewards for FREE products from any of our brands.

Our app also has an in app eWallet that allows you to go cashless and use your gift cards for in store or online purchases. You can also send a gift card to friends and family quickly and hassle free straight from your phone.

Welcome to Rewards by Global Brands. We invite you to download our app today!

Food Hall wanted to redefine the way we shop for groceries. The goal is to revolutionize the supermarket industry to cater for the new generation of consumer and ever-changing conditions in a post-pandemic era. Designed with the experience in mind, we are pleased to introduce Trinidad & Tobago’s first grocerant where you can get chef prepared meals along with all your other grocery essentials. We look forward to welcoming you to experience All things Food!

Cook with confidence and convenience. RecipeBox is the ultimate recipe organizer and meal planning companion for busy home chefs. Save all your favorite recipes from any website or app – from popular food blogs to Instagram and TikTok posts – and keep them organized in one place. Plan delicious meals for the week and automatically generate smart grocery lists so you can spend less time stressing and more time cooking. It’s like having a personal kitchen assistant, right in your pocket, inspiring you to eat better and save time each day.

KEY FEATURES:
• Save Recipes from Anywhere: Import recipes from any website or social platform (yes, even Instagram and TikTok) with a tap. RecipeBox strips out the clutter and saves just the recipe, so you can focus on cooking.
• Smart Grocery List & Shopping: Instantly turn recipes into a grocery list. Our smart list generator groups items by aisle and recipe. With one more tap, send your list to Walmart, Instacart, Kroger, H-E-B, AmazonFresh, and other partners for pickup or delivery – seamless grocery shopping from within the app.
• Meal Planner: Plan your meals for the week or month. Schedule recipes to your in-app calendar and build meal plans that suit your lifestyle. RecipeBox helps you balance what’s for dinner each night and even suggests meals based on ingredients you have.
• Organize Your Recipe Collection: Categorize recipes into custom collections (by cuisine, occasion, diet, etc.) – like your personal digital cookbook. Whether it’s family secrets or new Pinterest finds, keep everything neatly sorted and searchable.
• Discover & Search 2M+ Recipes: Need inspiration? Search over 2,000,000 recipes by keyword or ingredient to find your next favorite dish. Filter results by dietary preference (healthy, vegan, keto, and more) to find exactly what you’re craving.

Why RecipeBox? We’re built for home cooks who want to simplify meal planning and keep all their recipe inspiration in one place. RecipeBox helps you turn “What’s for dinner?” into an organized plan with a curated grocery list – making home cooking easier, healthier, and more fun.

Download RecipeBox for free and start saving recipes today. Your kitchen adventures are about to get a lot simpler!


Privacy Policy: https://www.recipebox.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.recipebox.com/terms-and-conditions

SousChef AI – Your Personal Cooking Assistant

Transform the way you cook with AI-powered recipe discovery and real-time cooking guidance. Snap a photo of any dish to get the recipe,
scan your ingredients for instant meal ideas, or chat with AI to create personalized recipes. Cook with confidence using step-by-step
guidance and live AI assistance.

FEATURES

- Snap a Dish to Get Recipe – See a delicious meal at a restaurant, in a cookbook, or online? Take a photo and instantly get a complete
recipe with ingredients and step-by-step instructions. Our AI identifies the dish and generates professional-quality recipes.
- Snap Ingredients to Get Recipe – Photograph ingredients in your fridge or pantry. AI recognizes everything and suggests multiple
recipes you can make right now. Reduce food waste and never wonder "what can I cook with this?" again.
- Chat to Create Recipes – Describe what you're craving in natural language. "Spicy chicken pasta for 4 people" or "healthy vegetarian
dinner." AI understands your preferences and generates personalized recipes instantly.
- Live AI Cooking Assistant – Get real-time help while you cook. Ask questions about any step, upload photos of your cooking progress for
 instant feedback, and receive guidance tailored to where you are in the recipe.
- Step-by-Step Cooking Mode – Cook with confidence using interactive cooking guidance. Track your progress, check off ingredients, follow
 visual step indicators, and use built-in timers for perfect results every time.
- Adjust Servings Instantly – Scale any recipe from 1 to 12 servings. All ingredient quantities automatically recalculate in real-time.
- Convert Measurements – Toggle between metric and imperial measurements with one tap. All ingredients update instantly across the entire
 app.
- Custom Cookbooks – Organize recipes your way. Create unlimited cookbooks, categorize by cuisine, meal type, or any system that works
for you. Add recipes to multiple collections.
- Visual Cooking Guides – Auto-generated images for complex cooking steps help you visualize techniques and achieve better results.
- Smart Recipe Details – See exactly which ingredients you need for each step (no more scrolling back and forth). Clear time estimates,
skill levels, nutritional information, and emoji icons for visual clarity.

OTHER FEATURES

- Toggle screen lock off while cooking so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Step-specific ingredient lists show what you need right when you need it.
- Temperature guidance with automatic Celsius/Fahrenheit conversion.
- Comprehensive onboarding to personalize recipes based on your dietary preferences, favorite cuisines, and cooking goals.
- Recipe progress tracking across all cooking sessions.
- High-quality generated images for every recipe.
- Optional ingredients clearly marked.
- Interactive tutorials for all features.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

SousChef AI includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1. Generate unlimited recipes from dish photos, ingredient scans, and chat.
2. Access unlimited cooking sessions with live AI assistance.
3. Use unlimited photo analysis for cooking feedback.

You can start a 3-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial,
you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The SousChef AI Premium
subscription renews automatically at the end of each period until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal
will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current
period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Welcome to Kaizan! Our new app let’s you keep in the know. Be the first to find out about our daily specials and special events! Love our monthly rolls? Be the first to find out what they are and beat the crowd. You can order via the app for both pick up and delivery and chat with us directly with any questions. Be in the know with the Kaizan app on the go!

developer: Internet Services Polen Sp. z o.o.
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797

Snoonu

Snoonu is an online app offering the fastest shopping & delivery services in Qatar, with a variety of restaurants, groceries, retail stores options, and more. 
 
Food Delivery

With Snoonu eating becomes easy - explore restaurant options and order food delivery in just a few clicks.
Find the best deals for fast food delivery like pizza from Papa John’s, Pizza Hut, or Yellow Cab; burgers from McDonald’s, fried chicken from Al Baik, Jollibee, KFC, or sandwiches from Subway.

Snoosend - point-to-point delivery service
 
“Snoosend'' - a new in-app category, enables you to send packages from one location to another within Qatar. You can find the “Snoosend” feature on the home page, place a delivery, select a “from” and “to” locations, write a description of the items, and proceed to check out.
